page.description: Places the cursor at the specified position.

argument.name: position
argument.description: The position of the cursor. 1 = Beginning of the text selection.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.CURSOR_SET() method places the cursor at the specified character Position on an open layout.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following script place under the OnArrive event of a field sets the cursor position to the fifth character.
